p: A solution of 1 (2 mg) in H 2O (1 mL) was hydrolyzed with β-glucosidase at 37 °C for 24 h. After reaction for 12 h, the TLC analysis (SiO 2 with n-BuOH-AcOH-H 2O 60:15:25) showed that the starting material has disappeared. The mixture was passed through a C-18 SEP-PACK cartridge, washed with H 2O and eluted with MeOH. The MeOH eluate gave the aglycone epimeric mixture. Selected 1H-NMR data (400 MHz, CD 3OD) of 1α and 1β epimers: δ H 1.10 (d, J = 7.0 Hz, H 3-10), 3.77 (s, OCH 3), 4.07/4.24 (br singlets, H-6), 4.98/5.42 (br singlets H-l) and 7.44 (s, H-3). HRESIMS m/ z 251.0893 [M + Na] + (calcd. for C 11H 16O 5Na, 251.0890).
